name: Crowne Plaza Tel Aviv City Center

reviews.text: I only stayed one night, but everything was up to the usual standards of this chain. Checkin/out was easy, service perfect (critically important for a business traveller), food good (though pricey as usual).
reviews.title: Perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I think I also got a room upgrade without asking (well, either that or the hotel is particularly good value!) The bathroom was particularly stylish.
reviews.title: Stylish and very cool!

reviews.text: We really enjoyed our stay here. It is not on the beach, but it has a free shuttle and they give you beach towels. It is next to a shopping mall, which is convenient. It is very stylish and the service is great. The guys in the reception were always ready to help. People were asking us why we stayed in this business district area, but this hotel really made the difference! You can get good weekend prices!
reviews.title: I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking

reviews.text: This is the second time we stayed here. The hotel facilities are very impressive. The rooms are very clean with comfortable beds. The staff is very friendly and courteous. The hotel is new, and the rooms are furnished with modern, functional furniture.Our room was great, lots of space and a wonderful bed.We did not have any problem with noise and we had the breakfast room all to ourselves.
reviews.title: Great Business Hotel

reviews.text: What a wonderful city, and you should aim to experience this stay at the best hotel, and that in my eyes is the Hotel Crowne Plaza Tel Aviv City Center.
reviews.title: Greatly Needs to Improve Customer Service
terrible service
reviews.text: In early January my husband and I decided to indulge ourselves and ordered room at Crowne Plaza City Center, Azrieli Tel Aviv.
We left the children with grandparents and went to the big city.
reviews.title: Already want to come back

reviews.text: We were clubbing until very late and went to sleep knowing before us many hours of sleep, finally to be waking up naturally, as we left without the children.
reviews.title: Best Business Hotel in Tel Aviv

reviews.text: But much to our surprise, six-thirty in the morning, after only 3 hours sleep, we woke up in alarm from a loud shrill voice of alarm in our room.
reviews.title: Perfect for small to medium events

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The alarm lasted several minutes, and after shutdown is activated a second time.
reviews.title: Absolutely perfect hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I can't find anything bad to say about this hotel. If you are looking for a beachfront hotel, look elsewhere, but even then, an quick bus ride will get you to the beach. The hotel is 10 minutes, 2 stations, and 7 NIS away from Ben Gurion Airport. There is an adjacent shopping mall, complete with numerous restaurants of all kinds. The rooms are ultra modern, and the hotel is only three years old.The service is impeccable.
reviews.title: Convenient, and ultramodern
Breakfast is not included in advertised rates
reviews.text: While it is clearly intended to be a business hotel, it serves the tourist well.

I would like to alert travellers that breakfast is not included in the stated rates. Parking fee which is around 5% of the rate is shown as an extra, but cost of the breakfast which is more than 25% of the rate is not displayed as extra. I believe it is unfair advertising of the hotel rates.
reviews.title: Nice rooms. Unfriendly staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Perfect hotel for exploring region by car
great stay - crowne plaza does the job

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have been to a number of hotels in Tel Aviv and this one is definitely my favourite. The room was perfect and was located on the 21st floor with a great view (we were upgraded). The room was very clean with wood floors which was a nice touch. I did not hear any outside noise or from any other room which was a big plus.
reviews.title: Favourite Hotel In Tel Aviv

reviews.text: The breakfast was excellent with a wide selection of traditional North American and more "lunch style" Israeli breakfast food.
reviews.title: an excellent experience!!!

reviews.text: The service we received from the front desk and concierge was excellent.
reviews.title: No other Hotel in Tel Aviv comes close!

reviews.text: The only negative was that the hotel wasn't next to the beach. However, if you have a car and are using the hotel as a base for driving around the country it is an excellent choice. The Ayalon highway is next door and you are 5 minutes from Highway 1. Parking is only $10 a day.
reviews.title: Best hotel in Tel-aviv

reviews.text: We stayed at the hotel for a quiet weekend. the rooms were lovely, and it was apleasure to relax and unwind in them. the rooms were clean and well kept.
reviews.title: The staff did't know to service!!!

aka: Crowne Plaza Tel Aviv City Hotel Tel Aviv
description: NEW & EXCITING HOTEL IN TEL AVIV In the heart of the city that never sleeps, amidst the center of the business, cultural and shopping districts of Tel Aviv, the new Crowne Plaza Tel Aviv City Center Hotel overlooks the entire vibrant metropolis. Boasting an ideal location, the hotel is conveniently situated 12 minutes from the Ben Gurion International Airport, a 5-minute drive from the Israel Trade Fairs and Convention Center the largest in the city, walking-distance from the city center and adjacent to the Azrieli Mall, one of the largest in Israel and comprising 180 shops. Crowne Plaza City Center Hotel offers an exclusive hospitality experience at world-class standards with modern urban dÃ©cor. The hotel provides meeting and guest rooms with the most advanced multi-media technologies and state-of-the-art business services. In addition, guests enjoy the convenience of the highly sophisticated and expertly equipped Holmes Place gym and fitness facilities including an indoor pool (The Health club services are available for guests above 18 years old only)
